name: Plantain Frittata
ingredients: 2   tablespoons  plus 1 teaspoon  olive oil , divided
1/2   red, green, yellow bell pepper , finely diced
2   small  ripe  yellow plantains , peeled and sliced into 1cm rounds
Dried red chile flakes , to serve

name: Easy Whipped Ricotta Toast
ingredients: 2   tablespoons  extra virgin  olive oil , plus more for bread

name: Instant Pot Easy-Peel Hard Boiled Eggs
ingredients: Large eggs , cold from the fridge—at least 1 egg or as many as will fit in a single layer in your pressure cooker

name: Easy Vegetable Tart with Carrots, Fennel and Chèvre
ingredients: 3/4 cup ( 100 g)   whole-wheat flour , spooned and leveled
3/4 cup ( 100 g)   all-purpose flour , spooned and leveled
8 tablespoons ( 122 g)  cold  unsalted butter , cut into 16 or so little pieces

name: Easy Asparagus Tart with Goat Cheese
ingredients: 8   ounces  herbed  goat cheese , at room temperature
1   ounce  (about 3/4 cup grated)  Pecorino Romano cheese
1   pound   asparagus , trimmed and peeled as needed

name: Halloumi Saganaki
ingredients: 1/4 cup ( 40 g ) fine semolina or  cornmeal

name: Lobster and Grilled Corn Panzanella
ingredients: 2   pints  grape or  cherry tomatoes , halved
1   small   red onion , thinly sliced, divided
4   ears   corn on the cob , unhusked
2 (8   ounce)  frozen uncooked  lobster tails , thawed and rinsed
5  (3/4-inch thick)  slices  Italian loaf or  ciabatta
1/4   teaspoon   kosher salt , plus more to taste
4  Persian  cucumbers , halved and cut crosswise into 1/2-inch pieces

name: Grilled Oysters with Spicy Miso Butter
ingredients: 2 dozen   medium to large   fresh oysters  in the shell
4   tablespoons   unsalted butter , softened to room temperature

name: Tteokbokki (Spicy Korean Rice Cakes)
ingredients: 1   small   yellow onion , cut into 1/2-inch halfmoons
3   green cabbage leaves , cut into 2-inch squares
1   pound  (about 3 cups) garaetteok (cylindrical  Korean rice cakes )
2  scallions , ends trimmed and cut into 2-inch pieces
1   tablespoon   soy sauce , plus more to taste
2   teaspoons   sugar , plus more to taste

name: Fried Polenta Panzanella with Tomato, Basil, and Burrata
Sesame Soba Noodles
ingredients: 9   ounces  dry  soba noodles  (see Recipe Note)
2   tablespoons   fresh lemon juice  or rice vinegar
2   tablespoons   toasted sesame seeds  (black or white)
2   green onions , roots trimmed and finely chopped
1   clove   garlic , grated with a  Microplane

name: Corn and Ricotta Bruschetta
ingredients: 8  thick  slices  whole-grain  batard  or boule bread (cut about 4 inches wide, 5 inches long, and 1 inch thick)

name: Pepperoni Rolls
ingredients: 3 1/2 cups ( 451 g )  all-purpose flour , divided, plus more if needed
8 to  9   ounces  (about 144 slices) thinly sliced  pepperoni

name: Easy Pork Bánh Mì
ingredients: 6 to 8 sprigs  cilantro , tender stems intact

name: Sesame Peanut Noodles
ingredients: 8   ounces  dry  soba , rice, or egg noodles
1   tablespoon   toasted sesame seeds , for garnish (optional)

name: BLT Wraps
ingredients: 1   head   butter lettuce , leaves roughly chopped

name: Grilled BBQ Chicken Sandwiches
ingredients: 2   pounds   boneless skinless chicken breasts , butterflied
1 to 1 1/2   cups   Hank’s Kansas City BBQ Sauce  or store-bought
2 to 3  grilled  serrano peppers , seeds removed

name: How to Grill the Best Burgers
Classic Chicken Salad
ingredients: 1   pound  raw  boneless, skinless chicken breasts , cut into 2 1/2-inch chunks (or 2 to 3 cups cooked chicken meat)
1/2   red bell pepper,  seeded and chopped
4 to 6   green  olives , pitted and minced
1/3   head   iceberg lettuce,  sliced and chopped
1  tablespoon   plum preserves , or any sweet berry preserve (or a lesser amount of honey)

name: Cuban Sandwich (Cubano)
ingredients: 1 (1- pound)  loaf  Cuban  or Italian  bread
8   ounces  thinly sliced  Swiss cheese , about 10 slices
1   pound   shredded  pork roast , heated until warmed through
10   slices  Black Forest or smoked  ham

name: How to Make a Grilled Cheese Sandwich
ingredients: 3   ounces  (about 2/3 to 1 cup)  shredded cheddar , Swiss, Jack, or fontina cheese

name: Braised BBQ Beef Sandwich
ingredients: 1   (18-ounce) bottle  of your favorite  barbecue sauce  (or 2 1/4 cups of your favorite homemade  barbecue sauce )
Salt  and freshly  ground black pepper

name: Crispy Baked Fish Sandwiches with Avocado Mayo and Pickled Onion
ingredients: 1 1/4   pounds  firm white fish such as  halibut , cod, or grouper
1  large ripe  avocado , peeled and pitted
4  soft sandwich  buns , such as  brioche

name: Enfrijoladas with Black Beans, Avocado and Cotija
ingredients: 1   large   red onion , thinly sliced, divided
2  ( 15-ounce )  cans black bean , not drained or 3 1/2 cups cooked beans plus 1 cup bean cooking liquid
1/3   cup  light or regular  sour cream

name: Kentucky Hot Brown
ingredients: 4  thick  slices   Texas toast  or white sandwich bread
1/8   teaspoon  freshly  ground black pepper , optional
1/2   teaspoon  chopped  fresh parsley , for garnish

name: Nashville Hot Chicken
ingredients: 1/4   cup   hot sauce , like Tabasco or Frank’s
10   boneless, skinless large chicken  thighs  (or 3 chicken breasts, see note above)
Oil   for frying , like  peanut  or  rice bran oil
2  to 6  tablespoons   cayenne pepper , depending on your heat preference
1 to 2   tablespoons   brown sugar , depending on your sweetness preference
Dill pickle   slices , or bread and butter if you prefer

name: Open-Faced Grilled Vegetable Tartines
ingredients: 2   medium  red or  yellow bell pepper
1   tablespoon   extra virgin olive oil , plus extra for bread
1/2   teaspoon   kosher salt , plus more to taste
Freshly  ground black pepper , to taste
1  large round  loaf   crusty bread , such as levain, sourdough, or Italian

name: Hot Ham and Cheese Sliders
ingredients: 1/2   pound  sliced  Swiss cheese , about 12 slices

name: Homemade Sabich
ingredients: 1   medium  Globe  eggplant  or 2 medium Italian eggplants, cut into 1/2-inch rounds
Sea salt , for the fried eggplants
Pinch  of freshly  ground black pepper
3   tablespoons   water , plus more as needed
1/4   cup  store-bought or  homemade  sliced  pickles
Amba  sauce, for serving (optional; see recipe note)

name: Loaded Veggie Sandwich
ingredients: 4  (1/2- to 3/4-inch)  slices  rustic  sourdough  or country bread
2 to 4 slices ( 2   ounces )  sharp cheddar cheese

name: Buckwheat Crepes with Egg, Ham, Cheese, and Asparagus
ingredients: 1/4 to  1/3   cup   sparkling water , plus additional sparkling water as needed
Approximately  2   tablespoons  salted or  unsalted butter
4   thin slices   ham , each cut or torn into 2 to 3 pieces

name: Chickpea Panini
ingredients: 2   tablespoons   fresh lemon juice , plus more for assembling
2   tablespoons   extra virgin olive oil , plus more for assembling
1  loosely packed  cup   grated carrot  (from 1 medium carrot)

name: Hawaiian Roll Sliders with Meat Sauce and Parm
ingredients: 2   teaspoons   kosher salt , plus more for garlic butter
1/2   teaspoon  freshly  ground black pepper , plus more for garlic butter
1 ( 12 - count ) package  King's Hawaiian sweet rolls
8   ounces  sliced low-moisture  mozzarella cheese  (about 8 slices)

name: Chicken Shawarma
ingredients: 1   tablespoon  neutral  oil , such as canola

name: Broccoli Cheddar Egg Bites
ingredients: Florets from 1 large bunch broccoli (about  300 g  broccoli  florets)
1/2   cup  crustless, torn (into tiny pieces)  fresh bread, packed
1 cup (4 ounces,  114 g ), packed,  grated sharp cheddar cheese

name: Menemen (Turkish Scrambled Eggs and Tomatoes)
ingredients: 6   sivri biber  (Turkish green peppers), seeded and finely diced
1   tablespoon   tatli biber salçasi  (Turkish sweet pepper paste)
1/4   bunch   fresh parsley , leaves coarsely chopped

name: New Jersey Italian Hot Dog
ingredients: 2   pounds   potatoes , peeled and cut into 1/2 inch chunks
2   medium   green peppers , sliced into strips
1   large  yellow or  white onion , sliced into strips
1  teaspoon   Italian seasoning , or a mixture of oregano, basil and rosemary
8   beef hot dogs , preferably with natural casings

name: 11 Easy, Not-Sad Take to Work Lunch Recipes
Coconut Carrot Soup with Cumin Oil
ingredients: 1   medium  white or  yellow onion , finely diced
12 ounces ( 3   cups)   carrots , cut into 1/8-inch rounds
1   teaspoon   kosher salt , divided plus more to taste
1/8   teaspoon  freshly  ground black pepper , plus more to taste
2   cups   vegetable stock , plus more if needed
1/2   teaspoon  mild  chili powder , such as Kashmiri chili powder
1/4   cup  loosely packed  cilantro , chopped, for garnish
2   tablespoons  neutral  oil , such as canola

name: Roasted Cabbage Steaks with Garlic Breadcrumbs
Sunflower Butter Crispy Treats
ingredients: 1/2   cup  unsalted  sunflower butter , stirred well

name: Simple Summer Tomato Salad
ingredients: 1/4   medium   red onion , very thinly sliced
2   pounds  ripe  tomatoes , any and all varieties welcome
Freshly  ground black pepper , to taste

name: Farro, Mushroom, and Egg Grain Bowls
ingredients: 3   cups   vegetable broth , plus more if needed
8   ounces   cremini mushrooms , cleaned, thinly sliced, and divided
1  small  garlic clove , grated or finely minced

name: Potato Knishes
ingredients: 1/2   cup  neutral  oil  (like  vegetable  or canola)
1   pound   russet potatoes , peeled and quartered

name: Jibarito Sandwich
ingredients: 4   cloves garlic , mashed to a paste
2   pounds  boneless, thin-cut  ribeye steaks  (about 4 thin-cut steaks)
1/2   red onion , thinly sliced in rings

name: Classic Kimbap (Korean Seaweed Rice Roll)
ingredients: 6   ounces  skirt steak or  sirloin beef , cut into 3 x 1/4-inch strips
4   cups  freshly cooked medium-grain  white rice
1   large   carrot , peeled and cut into 1/8-inch-wide matchsticks
Sesame oil , for brushing the kimbap

name: Old Bay Shrimp Rolls
ingredients: 2   cups  thinly sliced  shallots  (from 3-4 large shallots)
2   tablespoons  minced  chives , plus more for garnish
1   pound  large (26/30 count)  shrimp , peeled, deveined, and tails removed
4  top-split (or “ New England-style”) hot dog buns
1   head  of  butter  or Bibb  lettuce

name: Motta Porrichu (Spicy Coconut Ginger Omelette)
ingredients: 2   tablespoons  roughly chopped  fresh curry leaves
1  green bird's eye  chili , finely chopped
1 1/2 teaspoons pink salt or  1/2  teaspoon  table  salt

name: Air Fryer Baked Potatoes
ingredients: 4  medium to medium-large  russet potatoes  (about  10   ounces  each)
1/2   teaspoon   kosher salt , divided, plus more for serving
Freshly  ground black pepper , unsalted butter, shredded sharp cheddar, sour cream, and/or scallions, for serving (as desired)

name: Mercimek Corbasi (Turkish Lentil Soup)
ingredients: 1   large   yellow onion , finely diced (about 1 1/4 cups)
2   tablespoons  tatli biber salçasi ( Turkish sweet pepper paste )
1/2   teaspoon  freshly  ground black pepper , or to taste
2   teaspoons   pul biber , plus extra to sprinkle on top

name: Tortellini Salad
ingredients: 4   tablespoons  fresh  lemon juice  (from about 2 lemons)
1 small  red onion , finely chopped (about  1   cup )
1 small  yellow bell pepper , chopped (about  1   cup )
1  English cucumber , quartered lengthwise and thinly sliced (about  3   cups )
3/4   cup  pitted and sliced  kalamata olives
1 ( 14 - ounce ) can  artichoke hearts , drained and roughly chopped
8   ounces   turkey summer sausage , quartered lengthwise and sliced (about 2 cups)
1/2   cup  finely  chopped fresh basil  leaves

name: Bread and Butter Pickles
ingredients: 2 1/2  pounds  pickling  cucumbers,  fresh from the market
1  pound  white or  yellow onions , thinly sliced
6 allspice berries plus  a   pinch  of  ground allspice
6  whole   cloves  plus a pinch of ground cloves

name: Tex-Mex Chopped Chicken Salad with Cilantro-Lime Dressing
ingredients: 6   cups   romaine lettuce , chopped and packed
1   cup  English or Persian  cucumber, diced
1   tablespoon  plus  1   teaspoon   extra virgin olive oil
1 1/2   cups  fresh  corn kernels  (2 medium ears) or frozen and thawed
